text:
• Reducing annual improper payments by $\$50$ billion; • Reducing annual commercial activity costs by $\$6+$ billion; and • Disposing of $\$158$ of unneeded Federal real property assets. The American people can and should expect the executive branch and Congress to make these commitments a reality.
